content: Does cargo component support something with as in the like https://docs.rs/wit-bindgen/0.21.0/wit_bindgen/macro.generate.html? I have WIT that imports package but also need to use a rust crate that uses binding from dependent pkg. Result is compilation error because there are two rust binding instead they should be a using a common binding

Not currently, but we should add that. I see you opened https://github.com/bytecodealliance/cargo-component/issues/225. I'll see if I can get to it tomorrow.

support customizing WIT interface mapping 路 Issue #225 路 bytecodealliance/cargo-component
Implement same capability bytecodealliance/wit-bindgen#825.
